lotus-title: FEEL THE TOUCH OF LOTUS FLOWER ON YOUR SKIN
lotus-text: <0>Lotus flower fibers is beautifully soft, naturally light and breathable.</0> <0>It was sustainably made, using natural dyes and no chemicals, by transforming Lotus flower stems into a unique textiles.</0>
hemp-is-antibacterial: HEMP is antibacterial, which means you can wear it longer than other fabrics, before washing,
less-water-is-needed: at least 50% less water is needed to grow it,
linen-is-an-amazing-fabric: Linen is an amazing fabric. It’s not only wonderful to wear, but is also the oldest known, as well as one of the most sustainable! This is why we love it so much and we couldn't miss it.
magic-text-shop-the-looks: The magic of a Woman lies in her graceful flow & cyclical change. SHOP THE LOOKS
no-pesticides-need: no pesticides need to be used to grow it as it is weed,
our-leya-dresss-is-honored: Our LEYA dresss is honored by collaborations with two amazing artists. Jola Hardejewicz-Hardy, who hand-painted our prints and Zaritza, singer&song writer, confident liberated feminist who is dedicated to supporting other woman.
OUR ORGANIC COTTON VOILE QUALITY, NATURA: OUR ORGANIC COTTON VOILE QUALITY, NATURAL DYE
our-passion-leads-us-to-creativity: Our passion leads us to creativity. Quite organically we met beautiful person and became very good friends. We are honored to work with very talented artist Jola Hardejewicz-Hardy who dedicate her life and passion for art & painting on silk. This time Jola hand-panited for MYNA on organic cotton voile, the finest quality in our collection. Each blouse is different and unique.
sustainability-is-very-important-and-fas: Sustainability is very important and fashion is no longer only focused on comfort but also its impact on the environment. Our GEA and IVY basic tops are best examples. What do we know:
the-biggest-beauty: “The biggest beauty is, when you know who you are”
the-elegance-of-the-tulip: The elegance of the tulip lies in its simplicity. We used inspiration for our TULI dress from the petal shape. This A cut pattern flutters every figure. One of the most sustainable Tencel fabric used for this design perfectly reflects the inspiration ensuring comfort & elegance.
there-are-no-waste: there are no waste products as the whole plant is used for different purposes.
